data.comment: The big names in today's match at Villa Park have now been confirmed.
The match is underway at Villa Park.
In the minute 1, Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Aston Villa.
Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leeds's Helder Costa misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 4, Goal kick for Aston Villa at Villa Park.
Throw-in for Leeds at Villa Park.
Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 8, Paul Tierney awards Aston Villa a goal kick.
Pascal Struijk (Leeds) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 13, Leeds have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aston Villa's half?
Ball safe as Aston Villa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 15, Leeds to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
In Birmingham Aston Villa drive forward through John McGinn. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 17, Throw-in Aston Villa.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Birmingham.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 19, Paul Tierney awards the away team a throw-in.
Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aston Villa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Leeds in the half of Aston Villa.
Jamie Shackleton is on a sub for Pascal Struijk for Leeds.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
Leeds are pushing forward but Stuart Dallas's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Aston Villa goal kick.
In the minute 25, Paul Tierney awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Aston Villa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Important block from the Leeds defence as Jack Grealish fires in a strike for Aston Villa.
In the minute 27, Douglas Luiz of Aston Villa gets in a strike, but is off target.
Leeds have a goal kick.
Paul Tierney signals a Aston Villa throw-in in Leeds's half.
In the minute 28, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Leeds in their own half.
Aston Villa to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
In the minute 30, Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
In Birmingham Leeds attack through Ezgjan Alioski. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 32, Goal kick for Aston Villa at Villa Park.
Leeds pushes forward through Stuart Dallas, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Aston Villa in the half of Leeds.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Aston Villa push forward at Villa Park and Jack Grealish gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Leeds defence.
In the minute 37, Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leeds awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
In the minute 39, Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aston Villa's half?
Rodrigo Moreno for Leeds gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Paul Tierney awards Aston Villa a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Leeds needs to be cautious. Aston Villa have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Aston Villa.
In Birmingham a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 42, Leeds have a goal kick.
Aston Villa have a dangerous throw-in.
Leeds are coming forward and Patrick Bamford gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Aston Villa goal kick.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Leeds in the half of Aston Villa.
Free kick for Leeds in the half of Aston Villa.
The first-half is over at Villa Park.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Paul Tierney signals a Aston Villa throw-in in Leeds's half.
Stuart Dallas gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leeds.
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Aston Villa at Villa Park.
In the minute 49, Stuart Dallas (Leeds) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Leeds's Helder Costa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Birmingham.
In the minute 51, In Birmingham a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Birmingham.
Jack Grealish of Aston Villa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
In the minute 53, Tyrone Mings (Aston Villa) has received a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
In the minute 54, Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Goal! Patrick Bamford gives Leeds a 0-1 lead in Birmingham.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 57, Throw-in high up the field for Leeds in Birmingham.
Throw-in for Leeds close to the penalty box.
Leeds are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 59, Paul Tierney signals a throw-in for Leeds, close to Aston Villa's area.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Aston Villa in the half of Leeds.
Paul Tierney awards Aston Villa a goal kick.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
Leeds to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Aston Villa goal kick.
In the minute 64, Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Aston Villa.
Aston Villa make their first substitution with Bertrand Traore replacing Trezeguet.
In the minute 67, It's now 0-2 in Birmingham as Patrick Bamford scores for Leeds.
Can Aston Villa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leeds's half?
In the minute 69, Can Aston Villa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leeds's half?
Goal kick for Aston Villa at Villa Park.
Jack Grealish is booked for the home team.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 70, Paul Tierney signals a Leeds throw-in in Aston Villa's half.
Aston Villa have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Aston Villa at Villa Park.
In the minute 74, Goal! Patrick Bamford extends Leeds's lead to 0-3.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Aston Villa's Jack Grealish breaks free at Villa Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 77, Ball goes out of play for a Leeds goal kick.
Free kick Leeds.
Rodrigo Moreno for Leeds gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 78, Aston Villa have a goal kick.
The away team have replaced Rodrigo Moreno with Pablo Hernandez. This is the second substitution made today by Marcelo Bielsa.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 83, Paul Tierney awards the home team a throw-in.
Raphinha is replacing Helder Costa for Leeds at Villa Park.
Leeds are pushing forward but Pablo Hernandez's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 84, It's a goal kick for the home team in Birmingham.
Leeds's Raphinha is on target but unsuccessful.
Paul Tierney signals a Leeds throw-in in Aston Villa's half.
In the minute 87, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Leeds to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Aston Villa.
In the minute 89, Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aston Villa's half?
In Birmingham Aston Villa attack through Jack Grealish. The finish is off target, however.
Paul Tierney awards Leeds a goal kick.
Throw-in for Leeds at Villa Park.
Throw-in for Leeds in the half of Aston Villa.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Birmingham.
Free kick for Aston Villa in the half of Leeds.
At Villa Park the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball goes out of play for a Leeds goal kick.
Paul Tierney signals a Leeds throw-in in Aston Villa's half.
Leeds's Raphinha gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Aston Villa have a goal kick.
It's 0-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Mateusz Klich for Leeds has been booked by Paul Tierney and receives a first yellow card.
